channel.title: McKinley Park Development Council
channel.description: The McKinley Park Development Council's mission is to collectively foster economic, cultural and social development through the connection of residents, institutions and enterprises for the benefit of the McKinley Park neighborhood of Chicago.

item.title: Annual Board Elections Meeting! July 17, 2019
Neighborhood Plan Visioning Workshop!
Spring Meetings!
MDPC Endorses the Carbon Fee And Dividend Resolution
item.description:
<p>The MPDC signed a letter urging Alderman Cardenas and the Chicago City Council to pass <a href="https://chicago.councilmatic.org/legislation/r2017-915/">R2017-915</a>, a Resolution Calling for Support of National Carbon Fee &amp; Dividend Legislation, which urges that the United State Congress to pass Carbon Fee &amp; Dividend Legislation as a key element in reducing the risks of climate change.</p>
<p>A PDF copy of the letter is <a href="/pdf/MPDC_Climate_Letter-signed.pdf">here</a></p>
